participant_2.background:
I grow my own vegetables and take daily walks.
I start my day with a cup of coffee and a walk through Central Park.
i wear glasses.
I am a hard worker who is passionate about my hobbies.
I've kept my love of horror movies from my parents.

content.text: Hi there! What is your favorite way to spend a day off?
Hi! I love to walk through Central Park in the morning and then go for coffee. How about you?
I start my day off with a cup of coffee too! I love watching space documentaries and reading about astronomy.
I've always wanted to learn more about space. It's so fascinating!
It is! I love learning about all of the different planets and stars.
I think Jupiter is my favorite. It's so big and has so many moons.
Jupiter is really cool! I also like Saturn. It has the coolest rings.
I agree! Saturn's rings are so unique.
I could talk about space all day! It's so interesting.
Me too! I'm glad we met. We can talk about space more sometime.
